title: wtf is with rank??? complete demotion after provisional
body:
FIRST OFF 2 games i played had trolls and you guys still dont provide tribunal to deal with these cunts.

second off from silver 4 to bronze 4 wtf??

win 10 games ur still b1 fkn cooked how do u even work the system.

replies.body: Looking at your match history it seems like B4 is still higher than where you belong.
would you look at that, i learned something. I had bronze lyf mmr the whole time.

Obviously you had bad mmr and you brought this on yourself and i trying to get people to back you up. your clearly a bad player anyway since you were ranked in silver, but you think your so much better than people in bronze 4 why dont you climb out??? or were you boosted there?

Silver = Bronze.

What are you complaining about?
